mapper.sql: bc.bar_code_id, bc.bar_code_type, bc.work_order_id, bc.label_material_id, bc.print_quantity, bc.org_id, bc.remark, bc.status, bc.create_user_id, bc.create_time, bc.modified_user_id, bc.modified_time, bc.is_delete,
mapper.select: SELECT bar_code_content FROM bcm_bar_code_det WHERE bar_code_det_id = (SELECT Max(bcd.bar_code_det_id) FROM bcm_bar_code_det bcd LEFT JOIN bcm_bar_code bc ON bcd.bar_code_id = bc.bar_code_id WHERE bc.work_order_id=#{workOrderId})
